segments.text: Yes , I'm going to Europe on business and I need to purchase some Traveller's Cheques .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's no problem . Which currency would you like to buy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think Euros will be the best , as I'll only be in Mainland Europe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Do you have your passport with you ? How much would you like to purchase ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please fill in this form . How would you like it ? In 100 Euro cheques ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be perfect , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
